Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [Id], [lastName], [firstName], [Email], '********' AS [Password], [AddressId], [isAdmin] FROM [Customer] WHERE [Email] LIKE @email AND [Password] = [dbo].[Hash]([dbo].[Salt]([Presalt],@password,[Postsalt]))

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [Id], [lastname], [firstname], [Email], '********' AS [Password], [AddressId] FROM [Producer] WHERE [Email] LIKE @email AND [Password] = [dbo].[Hash]([dbo].[Salt]([Presalt],@password,[Postsalt]))

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT INTO[Address]([Rue],[Numero],[Codepostal],[Ville],[Pays],[Lon],[Lat]) OUTPUT [inserted].Id Values (@Rue, @Numero, @Codepostal, @Ville, @Pays, @Long, @Lat) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @Presalt UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NEWID() DECLARE @Postsalt UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NEWID() DECLARE @PwdHased as BINARY(64) SET @PwdHased=[dbo].[Hash]([dbo].[Salt](@Presalt,@Password,@Postsalt))
INSERT INTO [Customer]([Lastname], [Firstname], [Email], [Password], [Presalt], [Postsalt], [AddressId],[isAdmin]) OUTPUT [Inserted].[Id] VALUES (@LastName,@FirstName,@Email,@PwdHased,@Presalt, @Postsalt, @AddressId, @isAdmin)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @Presalt UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NEWID() DECLARE @Postsalt UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NEWID() DECLARE @PwdHased as BINARY(64) SET @PwdHased=[dbo].[Hash]([dbo].[Salt](@Presalt,@Password,@Postsalt))
INSERT INTO [Producer]([Lastname], [Firstname], [Email], [Password], [Presalt], [Postsalt], [AddressId]) OUTPUT [Inserted].[Id] VALUES (@LastName,@FirstName,@Email,@PwdHased,@Presalt, @Postsalt, @AddressId)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO [Product]([Name],[Quantite],[ProducteurID],[Description],[Price]) OUTPUT [Inserted].[Id] Values (@nom, @quantite, @ProducteurId, @Description,@Price) RETURN 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO [Purchase]([Date],[CustomerID],[ProductID], [Quantity]) OUTPUT [inserted].[Id] VALUES (@Date,@CustomerId,@ProductId,@Quantite) RETURN 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM [Product] where [Id]=@id RETURN 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * from [Address] WHERE [Id]=(SELECT AddressId FROM [Customer] where Id=@id) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * from [Address] WHERE [Id]=(SELECT AddressId FROM [Producer] where Id=@id) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM [Address] WHERE [Id]=@id RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT [Id],[Lastname],[Firstname],[AddressId],[Email],'******' as [Password], [isAdmin] FROM [Customer] WHERE [Id]=@id RETURN 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [Id],[Lastname],[Firstname],[AddressId],[Email],'******' as [Password], [isAdmin] FROM [Customer] WHERE [Id]=(SELECT [CustomerID] FROM [Purchase] where [Id]=@id) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT [Id],[Lastname],[Firstname],[AddressId],[Email],'******' as [Password] FROM [Producer] WHERE [Id]=@id RETURN 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [Id],[Lastname],[Firstname],[AddressId],[Email],'******' as [Password] FROM [Producer] WHERE [Id]=(SELECT [ProducteurID] FROM [Product] where [Id]=@id) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM [Product] WHERE [Id]=@id RETURN 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM [Product] WHERE [Id]=(SELECT [ProductID] FROM [Purchase] where [Id]=@id) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [Id],[LastName],[FirstName],[Email],'********' AS [Password],[AddressId] FROM [Producer] RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[GetProducters] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * from [Product] RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[GetProducts] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM [Purchase] WHERE [Id]=@id RETURN 0 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN RETURN HASHBYTES('SHA2_512',@saltedPwd) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @SaltedPwd as NVARCHAR(max) RETURN CONCAT(@presalt, @password, @postSalt) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE [Product] SET [Name]=@nom, [Quantite]=@quantite, [Description]=@description, [Price]=@Price WHERE [Id]=@id RETURN 0 END
